existing_features.title: Revise the post-login splash message pool to be "extra extra spicy" in tone while remaining non-profane, non-defamatory, and focused on safety, boundaries, documentation, and legal accountability (update the fixed message list used by the post-login splash).

Replace the single static fallback image in the post-login splash (used when no motivational video is set) with a small set of generated, generic "mugshot-style" visuals and randomly choose one each time the splash is shown.

new_feature_requests.summary: Revise motivation text and accompanying mug shot content to be "extra extra spicy" toward the stalker (adjust tone/content)
